alert.note: Alert for Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NIAGARA AND NORTHERN ORLEANS COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanborn to near Lockport to 7 miles northwest of Medina to near Holley. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Albion, Grand Island, Newfane, Waterport, Lakeside Beach State Park, Sanborn, Point Breeze, Kent, Ridgeway, Gaines, Kendall, Wilson, Lyndonville, Barker, Cambria Center, Olcott, Pendleton Center, Ransomville, and Fancher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
